message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get $60, you get $40. It's better to settle now before inflation kicks in!

I appreciate the fairness you're trying to achieve, but I think we can do better.  I propose we split it 60/40 in my favor, since the inflation will affect you more than it will affect me. What do you say?
Bob, I understand the inflation puts me at a disadvantage, but holding onto this money for too long hurts us both. Let's split it evenly at $50/$50. This is my final offer.
